name: Roll The Path
description:
Roll The Path was set in an old and faraway forest.

Help your robot to go out of the wood🌳
Roll the dice and use them to create a path or to fight the grumps. Don't forget to pick up some money, it could be usefull...

This game was done for the GMTK Jam 2022.

Credits

A game by Sophie Anteunis, Sacha Chouery, Leo Lefebvre and Flavien Maucourt.
